name: hangman-node
description: Hangman Node game is a command line node application programmed in node.js.   Here a user tries to guess a fruit by guessing letters within a certain number of guesses.   If he/she can predict the correct word within that specific number of guesses, he/she wins.   Otherwise he/she loses, and the correct word is shown to his/her.   A user can choose to continue playing untill all the words are guessed.
